job_details.full_text:
Generative AI Engineer

As a Generative AI engineer you will lead the development of generative AI solutions within Vopak. The purpose is to make information in unstructured data like documents more easily accessible. We envision generative AI as tool which will support employees in three ways:

   To drive this development, you will work on

profile_classification.rationale: The job title and description explicitly mention 'Generative AI Engineer' and focus on developing solutions using generative AI to make unstructured data accessible. The core responsibilities align with building applications on top of generative models, which is the defining characteristic of a GenAI Engineer.

job_tasks.phrase: lead the development of generative AI solutions
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly indicates involvement in the creation and development of AI models, specifically generative ones.

job_tasks.phrase: make information in unstructured data like documents more easily accessible
job_tasks.justification: This describes a core application of generative AI, often involving techniques like RAG or fine-tuning models to process and extract information from unstructured sources.

job_tasks.phrase: The purpose is to make information in unstructured data like documents more easily accessible. We envision generative AI as tool which will support employees
job_tasks.justification: This indicates the development of a tool or application that will be used by employees, implying software development to integrate the AI solution.

job_tasks.phrase: To drive this development, you will work on
job_tasks.justification: This phrase suggests active involvement in the practical implementation and building of the AI solutions, which falls under software development.

soft_skills.phrase: lead the development of generative AI solutions within Vopak
soft_skills.justification: The term 'lead' implies taking initiative and ownership of the development process.

soft_skills.phrase: make information in unstructured data like documents more easily accessible
soft_skills.justification: This describes a problem (difficulty accessing information) that the generative AI solution aims to solve, requiring problem-solving skills.
